title: Canaveral National Seashore: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       The staff of Canaveral National Seashore is committed to preserving this unique undeveloped seashore paradise for the enjoyment of this and future generations. We work closely with Federal, state, local and private partners to accomplish our mission, while maintaining open lines of communication with the community and our visitors.  Superintendent's Compendium  11-24-14: The Superintendent's compendium is revised as follows:  "All fishing poles and lines will be maintained within 10 feet of the surf's edge."  Determination. Regulating the location of the fishing poles will improve visitor safety and unimpeded access of emergency response personnel.  ENABLING LEGISLATION  Designation as National Seashore - January 3, 1975 Public Law 93-626 (PDF, 992kb)  Seminole Rest Enabling Legislation - October 31, 1988 Public Law 100-564 (PDF, 65kb)  Resource Brief: Fixed-Station Water Quality Monitoring Data Summary - 2010
